Hello, First thanks for such a nice charts. It really helps for my app.

Coming to my issue, i am having a requirement when I need to display chart for the selected item in grid view. So I need to display in small size. I tried setting Height and Width to minimum (Say 200,200). What i am seeing is the control is not rendering based on Height and Width. It is getting truncated.
Is there any way to render chart based on random Height nad Width? or Do I need to use any default Height and Width?

Thanks in advance.

Hi,

the pie chart has a parameter "PieMinimalSize" which defines the minimal size of the piechart.
Set this value to "200.0" and the chart should be smaller. Search in the sample of the project for "PieMinimalSize" to see how to change it.

Torsten

Thank You.

To change the color palette follow the documentation: http://modernuicharts.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Custom%20Color%20Palette

Or check the sample applications in this project. It should be easy.
